A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie really good. It adds nuance to characters and their arcs and even questions the concepts that Star Wars is built upon. I am baffled by the low ratings from other audience members for this movie. The pacing at points could be tighter since it does fall prey to second-movie-itis. The character dynamics are interesting and different for a Star Wars film\, but this movie still feels true to the franchise.
